entry.title: Russia Says It Is Open to Talks With Ukraine, Turkey on Grain Exports
entry.content: Comments from Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov came as his Ukrainian counterpart said a Russian naval blockade on Ukraine has “shredded global chains of food supply.”

entry.title: Food Prices Squeeze Poorest in Rich Countries
entry.content: Some 44% of adults polled by the U.K. recently said they were buying less food, as the pain from higher prices spreads beyond less-developed nations.

entry.title: Afghanistan's Independent Media Is Fading Away, but a Few Hold Out
entry.content: Tolo News covers women’s rights and the Taliban resistance at great risk to its journalists; “there are new rules nearly every day.”
